testcase.name: Test that when echo_headers endpoint accepts a query param, request headers are echoed back as response headers but with given prefix attached to header name()
Test that hello endpoint reads the Accept_language header and response in the appropriate language when name query param is not provided()
Test that hello endpoint reads the Accept_language header and response in the appropriate language when name query param is provided()
Test that echo_headers endpoint returns json object when Accept heading contains json, and string object otherwise()
Test that echo_headers endpoint returns list of all request headers in response()
Test that endpoint has a path variable that responds with hello from supported languages()
Test that in the case that the prefix is not null, echo_headers endpoint with a query parameter returns empty response body()
Test that hello endpoint returns Hello when no name parameter is used()
Test that hello endpoint accepts optional name param and uses it in response when available()
